H0.text: Camera is the best tool used to observe a soil sample.

H1.text: Compass is the best tool for observing a soil sample.

H2.text: Hand lens is the tool best used to observe a soil sample.

H3.text: Telescope is the best tool to observe a soil sample.

A4.text: Magnifying glasses typically have low magnifying power: 2×–6×, with lower magnification providing a wider lens and larger field of view.
